issue.title: make doc is failing in Saucy/Trusty (doxygen problem)

content.raw:
The line is triggering the error [is in the CMakeList.txt](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/5fb91a395d78e7bc262d699a751d9902327cbae3/doc/CMakeLists.txt?at=default#cl-19) of doc subdirectory and manually can be run by:

```make -C /home/jrivero/code/gazebo/build/doxygen/latex```

By some obscure reason, modifying the Makefile in the latex directory adding just an echo, is making the thing not to fail (returning 0):

```
...
	while egrep -s 'Rerun (LaTeX|to get cross-references right)' refman.log && [ $$latex_count -gt 0 ] ;\
	    do \
	      echo "Rerunning latex...." ;\
	      pdflatex refman && echo "yes!" ;\
	      latex_count=`expr $$latex_count - 1` ;\
	      echo "why adding this is making it to work?" ;\
	    done
....
```
But it is still generating 1900 pages in pdf.
content.html:
The line is triggering the error is in the CMakeList.txt of doc subdirectory and manually can be run by:

make -C /home/jrivero/code/gazebo/build/doxygen/latex

By some obscure reason, modifying the Makefile in the latex directory adding just an echo, is making the thing not to fail (returning 0):

...
    while egrep -s 'Rerun (LaTeX|to get cross-references right)' refman.log && [ $$latex_count -gt 0 ] ;\
        do \
          echo "Rerunning latex...." ;\
          pdflatex refman && echo "yes!" ;\
          latex_count=`expr $$latex_count - 1` ;\
          echo "why adding this is making it to work?" ;\
        done
....

But it is still generating 1900 pages in pdf.
